metadata.title: CVE-2024-0809 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in Autofill in Google Chrome prior to121.0.6167.85 allowed a remote attacker to bypass Autofill restrictions viaa crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity: Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
